args: Heavens! What is a bear doing here?!
This isn't the place, silly!\nIt's over that way!
Do you know what that bear is doing here?
Sure! There's a big animal gathering\ngoing on in the courtyard.
Animals come to courtyard sometimes.\nWe talk together.
If any of the animals are worried about\nanything, we try to help 'em out. \nBecause we're ADULTS! Hee hee!
So that bear was off to participate\nin this gathering of yours, eh?
Rawn happy with it. Animals too.
EVERYONE will be happy with it!\nSo yeah, c'mon!
Goodness... It is as if I am awash\nin a sea of fluff and fuzz!
Uh oh. You look down, Mr. Bear.\nWhat's wrong?
Bear had big fight with friend.\nHe want to make up, but not know how.
Aw, this is easy! First, apologize.\nSecond, ask to be friends again.
If saying is hard, give present.\nThat like handing over silent feelings.
Rawn would give dried meat.\nFood always welcome gift!
Being stubborn isn't going to\nsolve your problem!
Perhaps he's just worried his friend\nmight not forgive him.
I understand how you feel. But if the shoe\nwere on the other...er, paw, would you\nrefuse to forgive your friend?
You see? I'm sure your friend feels\nthe same way.
Bear happy now. He going to\ngive honey as apology gift.
You handled that really well, Elisanne!
I said nothing special, really.\nBut I am glad to have helped.
He's in love with another bunny.
But loads of other bunnies ALSO love her,\nso he doesn't know what to do.
A problem with rabbit romance, is it?
Right then, let's see... You're in love,\nand have a load of rivals, sooo...
So this one is all Elisanne!
M-me?! I couldn't possibly! I mean,\nI may read a great number of romantic\nnovels, but I have no ACTUAL experience.
Ack! I can't resist those little round eyes!\nEr, yes. Right then... *cough*

You are concerned about the number of
rivals you have, yes? It must feel as if
they are much more charming than you
and full of things you lack, besides.

But forget what you lack. You must focus
on what things you CAN do, then do them
to the best of your ability. If this is your
path, you will have no regrets.
Think about what you can do for the bunny\nyou love, then see it done.
I find this hard to believe, but that rabbit\nactually looks a little less worried.
Now ALL the animals want to talk to you\nabout their problems!
Well, I'm happy to help if I can...
Animals happy now. Worries all gone.
That was hard work, but also quite\nrewarding in its own way.
Say, Elisanne? Do YOU have worries?
You help us. We want to help back.
I'm happy you feel that way, but I don't...\nOh dear!
Well, this isn't really a WORRY, per se,\nbut I hear that those who raise cats\nand dogs find it relaxing to pet them.
I couldn't help but think about that,\nseeing all these animals here.
Is that right? All right, here goes...
